projects.name: E-commerce Platform for SaaS Security Solutions
projects.description: Development of a mobile-first e-commerce platform for Cyna, offering cybersecurity SaaS solutions (SOC, EDR, XDR). Features include product browsing, shopping cart, checkout system, user account management, and admin backoffice.

projects.name: Medication management application in C# with WinForms
projects.description: A desktop application for managing medications, including features like adding, editing, and deleting medications, as well as tracking medication schedules. The application uses a SQL Server database for data storage.
